long_description: Sibling of the Aviator, the Skullcandy Navigator headphones mark the evolution of headphones that transport seriously premium sound, attained by heavy investment into audio engineering and research. Incredible sound and high-grade materials are coupled with head-turning style-ear candy that is easy on the eyes and comfortable on the head for hours of musical bliss. Take charge of the conversation with an inline mic when you're not enjoying the aggressive bass, natural vocals, and precision highs that deliver pure audio bliss. Soft and leathery, memory foam ear pillows provide cushy comfort; high-grade materials help ensure durability. The svelte Skullcandy Navigator headphones come with a detachable cable and a travel bag that stores your assets in snug style.
short_description: Sibling of the Aviator, the Skullcandy Navigator headphones mark the evolution of headphones that transport seriously premium sound, attained by heavy investment into audio engineering and research.
